plot: This documentary etches vivid portraits of four extraordinary figures who were willing to die to preserve their way of life: Crazy Horse, Chief Joseph, Geronimo, and Quanah Parker.
title: America's Great Indian Leaders
plot_es: This documentary etches vivid portraits of four extraordinary figures who were willing to die to preserve their way of life: Crazy Horse, Chief Joseph, Geronimo, and Quanah Parker.
